author: TheRealBenForce
body:
I found this link for assistance in determining the link to resolve to an extension for direct downloads from the marketplace. 
https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/extension-gallery

The link I came up with for Powershell 0.7.2 is this, however it does not resolve. I tried a few variations.
https://Microsoft.gallery.vsassets.io/_apis/public/gallery/publisher/Microsoft/extension/PowerShell/0.7.2/assetbyname/Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.VSIXPackage

I tested the example link, and this does resolve.
https://dbaeumer.gallery.vsassets.io/_apis/public/gallery/publisher/dbaeumer/extension/vscode-eslint/0.10.18/assetbyname/Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.VSIXPackage
## Steps to reproduce

Follow instructions at this link to compose direct download marketplace link. Place created link in browser:
https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/extension-gallery
## Expected behavior

Link resolves to powershell marketplace vsix download.
## Actual behavior

HTTP 404 Not Found
## Environment data

n/a

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: vscode-powershell issues should be reported in https://github.com/PowerShell/vscode-powershell.

title: 404 on direct download marketplace url
